prepareScript:
sudo rm -f /etc/yum.repos.d/*.repo; sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/rhel10internal.repo <<EOT
[RHEL-10-NIGHTLY-BaseOS]
name=baseos
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-10/nightly/RHEL-10/latest-RHEL-10.0/compose/BaseOS/aarch64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0

[RHEL-10-NIGHTLY-AppStream]
name=appstream
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-10/nightly/RHEL-10/latest-RHEL-10.0/compose/AppStream/aarch64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0

[RHEL-10-NIGHTLY-CRB]
name=crb
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-10/nightly/RHEL-10/latest-RHEL-10.0/compose/CRB/aarch64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0
EOT
